name: Avocado, Orange and Pomegranate Salsa
description: A seasonal twist on fruit salsa!

ingredients.name: orange
ingredients.additionalInstruction: peeled and cut into segments, any juice reserved

preparation: Place avocado, orange with juice, and pomegranate seeds in a shallow bowl.
Sprinkle with remaining ingredients and toss gently. Serve at room temperature with tortilla chips.
